pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw:
I've seen this problem before. This is most likely due to gazebo not cleaning up properly between the test cases. From experience, this could be:

-  scene, visual shared pointers are still kept alive 

-  the state of singleton classes are not reset. 

- previous gazebo events connections are still alive
content.html:
I've seen this problem before. This is most likely due to gazebo not cleaning up properly between the test cases. From experience, this could be:

  • scene, visual shared pointers are still kept alive

  • the state of singleton classes are not reset.

  • previous gazebo events connections are still alive
